Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Matt Lawton
Dear Sir,
Matt Lawton has an AVG of .378 at A El Paso Diablos!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Tim Naehring
Dear Sir,
Tim Naehring has an AVG of .247 at AA Tulsa Drillers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Yamil Benitez
Dear Sir,
Yamil Benitez isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an AVG of .152, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
